title: Shoutcasting
body:
Hey,
Is any one hosting or knows of knows of any one hosting an amateur League Of Legends tournament? Me and someone else have been practicing our shoutcasting for local tournaments and are looking to obtain more experience. We have consistently been getting very good reviews as we have very good synergy between us as a play by play caster and a color caster. So yeah, if any one is hosting a tournament and needs a pair of shoutcasters would be more then willing to help!

Much appreciated!
Talkwyn

replies.body:
Hey Talkwyn,

Spawn here, one of the shoutcasters from the Riot Syd office. First off, nice work getting started up is always difficult and getting that initial exposure is really hard.

I know Atlus and Rusty have some connection with people like this and there are definitely orgs you can seek out.

If you throw me an add in game happy to chat.

Cheers
Hey Jake! Love your work man, enjoy all your shout casting would'nt be the same without you on the panel!

Yeah I agree. The OPL would be completely different with out him there. It's weird just thinking about it haha. He's been a massive influence on my shout casting aswell and he has definitely inspired me!

I have a lot of respect for anyone who can do this, I've tried myself (just mucking about with friends) and it's not easy stringing original vocabulary together over some fast paced action.
Love to watch anything you have done if you have any links to put up xD

Thanks man, I really enjoy it. We don't currently have anything right now. We were thinking of starting up a YouTube channel with some of our casts, but was wondering if it would be well received. Obviously at least one person would enjoy it so we might have to give it a go!
Do you have any links of stuff you have done by any chance?
no no no lol, we were just mucking about with replays etc. i would never attempt it for real haha
Haha no worries, it's definitely  alot of fun!

Hey friend,
It seems as if you're from North America, and this is the OCE boards page. If you are actually from OCE, I am happy to get some casters for my upcoming online tournament that I will be organising. Add me!

Ah yeah sorry about that >.< 
I am actually from OCE I was just logged into my NA account by mistake as I like to visit the boards on NA sometimes aswell haha.
I added you in game so I guess we can talk soon!
